title: Outpatient Therapeutic Community Support Fund
description: To provide general support to the Outpatient Therapeutic Community (OTC) program within the Addiction Research and Treatment Services at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent:
To provide general support to the Outpatient Therapeutic Community (OTC) program within the Addiction Research and Treatment Services at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.

To provide support to the Outpatient Therapeutic Community (OTC) program within the ARTS program.
